long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BradPop allows you to automatically extract website branding.

You can easily view a website's colour palette (grouped using machine learning by visual importance and contrast), seeing which colours work with each other to create the brand's unique identity.

BrandPop also provides extensive font use analysis, including a full breakdown of the site's use of fonts (grouped by use case such as heading, body, caption etc.) A bespoke AI model analyses font images to suggest similar fonts for different use cases.

Various AI models also display the company's voice and branding information, as well as analysing image themes and semantics.
